titles: An elegie sacred to the memory of Sir Edmund-bury Godfrey Knight; whose body was lately found barbarously murthered, and since honourably interr'd, the 31th of October, 1678.
author: Care, Henry, 1646-1688.
notes: Verse: "An elegie! forbear: who ere profanes".
Within mourning borders, with emblems and motto.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Godfrey, Edmund Berry, --  Sir, 1621-1678 --  Early works to 1800.
